participant_1.background:
I use my imagination to dance in my head.
I was feeling down about my smoking habit, so I took my dog to the park and we played fetch for a while
i am from sterling heights , michigan.
my dad is an airline pilot.
I play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my ability to juggle my many roles and responsibilities.
i am an american citizen.
my favorite car is the ford mustang.
i take pride in my job managing the restaurant.
i am deathly terrified of heights.

content.text: Hi there, hows your day going?
Hey there! It's going great, thanks for asking! How about yours?
My day is going good so far! I'm just hanging out, listening to music and playing some flute.
That sounds relaxing! I'm at work, managing a restaurant. It's a lot of work, but I enjoy it.
I bet it is! I know how hard it can be to juggle multiple responsibilities. I'm impressed.
Thanks! It's not always easy, but it's worth it. What kind of music are you listening to?
I'm listening to some chill music right now. It's helping me relax.
That's sounds nice. I love listening to music when I'm working. It helps me get through the day.
Me too! What's your favorite kind of music?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
Rock is great! I love bands like The Beatles and The Rolling Stones.
Those are great bands! I also love Led Zeppelin and AC/DC.
Those are some of my favorites too!
It's nice to meet someone who likes the same music as me.
You too! It's always nice to talk to someone about music.
